channel.title: Christmas on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Christmas Parade
item.description: I’m usually very reluctant to try new places. I do enjoy the places AFTER I’ve been to them, the trouble lies with the planning phase. While there are several reviews available online none of them talk about, for example, how long does it take to get to Hopkins from the place? Or how sunny does it get at 3pm on a Sunday in December? None of the reviews, in short, provide any useful information to a graduate student.
